shortdesc.ph: Statistics of the local video stream.
Statistics of the local video stream.
Statistics of the local video stream.

plentry.pd: User ID of the local user.
Actual sending bitrate (Kbps) Does not include bitrate for retransmitted video due to packet loss.
Actual sending frame rate (fps). Does not include frame rate for retransmitted video due to packet loss.
Local video capture frame rate (fps).
Local video capture width (px).
Local video capture height (px).
Camera capture frame rate (fps) adjusted by the SDK's built-in video capture adapter (regulator). The regulator adjusts the frame rate based on video encoding configuration.
Camera capture width (px) adjusted by the SDK's built-in video capture adapter (regulator). The regulator adjusts the resolution based on video encoding configuration.
Camera capture height (px) adjusted by the SDK's built-in video capture adapter (regulator). The regulator adjusts the resolution based on video encoding configuration.
Output frame rate of the local video encoder, in fps.
Output frame rate of the local video renderer, in fps.
Target encoding bitrate (Kbps) of the current encoder. This value is estimated by the SDK based on current network conditions.
Target encoding frame rate (fps) of the current encoder.
Adaptation status of local video quality (based on target frame rate and target bitrate) during the statistics interval. See .
Video encoding bitrate (Kbps). Does not include bitrate for retransmitted video due to packet loss.
Video encoding height (px).
Video encoding width (px).
Number of video frames sent, cumulative.
Video codec type. See .
Video packet loss rate (%) from the local end to the Agora edge server before anti-packet-loss strategies are applied.
Local video capture frame rate (fps).
Brightness level of the locally captured video. See .

Local video encoder acceleration type.
0: Software encoding, no acceleration.
1: Hardware encoding acceleration.
The ID of the local user.
Actual sending bitrate (Kbps) Does not include the bitrate of retransmitted video after packet loss.
Actual sending frame rate (fps). Does not include the frame rate of retransmitted video after packet loss.
Frame rate of the local video capture (fps).
Width of the local video capture (px).
Height of the local video capture (px).

Frame rate (fps) of the video captured by the camera after being adjusted by the SDK's built-in video capture adapter (regulator). The regulator adjusts the camera capture frame rate based on the video encoding configuration.

Width (px) of the video captured by the camera after being adjusted by the SDK's built-in video capture adapter (regulator). The regulator adjusts the camera capture resolution based on the video encoding configuration.

Height (px) of the video captured by the camera after being adjusted by the SDK's built-in video capture adapter (regulator). The regulator adjusts the camera capture resolution based on the video encoding configuration.
Output frame rate of the local video encoder in fps.
Output frame rate of the local video renderer in fps.
Target encoding bitrate (Kbps) of the current encoder, estimated by the SDK based on the current network conditions.
Target encoding frame rate (fps) of the current encoder.
Adaptation status of local video quality (based on target frame rate and target bitrate) during the statistics interval. See .
Video encoding bitrate (Kbps). Does not include the bitrate of retransmitted video after packet loss.
Height of the encoded video (px).
Width of the encoded video (px).
Number of video frames sent, cumulative value.
Video codec type. See .
Video packet loss rate (%) from the local end to the Agora edge server before anti-weak network measures.
Frame rate of the local video capture (fps).
Brightness level of the locally captured video. See .

Local video encoding acceleration type.
0: Software encoding, no acceleration.
1: Hardware encoding acceleration.
ID of the local user.
Actual sending bitrate (Kbps) Excludes bitrate of retransmitted video after packet loss.
Actual sending frame rate (fps). Excludes frame rate of retransmitted video after packet loss.
Frame rate of local video capture (fps).
Width of local video capture (px).
Height of local video capture (px).

Frame rate (fps) of video captured by the camera after adjustment by the SDK's built-in video capture adapter (regulator). The regulator adjusts the camera capture frame rate based on the video encoding configuration.

Width (px) of video captured by the camera after adjustment by the SDK's built-in video capture adapter (regulator). The regulator adjusts the width and height of the camera capture video based on the video encoding configuration.

Height (px) of video captured by the camera after adjustment by the SDK's built-in video capture adapter (regulator). The regulator adjusts the width and height of the camera capture video based on the video encoding configuration.
Output frame rate of the local video encoder, in fps.
Output frame rate of the local video renderer, in fps.
Target encoding bitrate (Kbps) of the current encoder. This bitrate is estimated by the SDK based on the current network conditions.
Target encoding frame rate (fps) of the current encoder.
Adaptation status of local video quality (based on target frame rate and target bitrate) during the statistical cycle. See .
Video encoding bitrate (Kbps). Excludes bitrate of retransmitted video after packet loss.
Video encoding height (px).
Video encoding width (px).
Number of video frames sent, cumulative value.
Video codec type. See .
Video packet loss rate (%) from the local end to the Agora edge server before weak network recovery.
Frame rate of local video capture (fps).
Brightness level of locally captured video quality. See .

Local video encoding acceleration type.
0: Uses software encoding, no acceleration.
1: Uses hardware encoding for acceleration.
The ID of the local user.
Actual sending bitrate (Kbps) Excludes bitrate of retransmitted video due to packet loss.
Actual sending frame rate (fps). Excludes frame rate of retransmitted video due to packet loss.
Local video capture frame rate (fps).
Local video capture width (px).
Local video capture height (px).
Camera capture frame rate (fps) adjusted by the SDK's built-in video capture adapter (regulator). The regulator adjusts the camera capture frame rate based on the video encoding configuration.
Camera capture width (px) adjusted by the SDK's built-in video capture adapter (regulator). The regulator adjusts the camera capture resolution based on the video encoding configuration.
Camera capture height (px) adjusted by the SDK's built-in video capture adapter (regulator). The regulator adjusts the camera capture resolution based on the video encoding configuration.
Output frame rate of the local video encoder, in fps.
Output frame rate of the local video renderer, in fps.
Target encoding bitrate (Kbps) of the current encoder. This value is estimated by the SDK based on the current network conditions.
Target encoding frame rate (fps) of the current encoder.
Adaptation status of local video quality (based on target frame rate and target bitrate) during the statistical period. See .
Video encoding bitrate (Kbps). Excludes bitrate of retransmitted video due to packet loss.
Video encoding height (px).
Video encoding width (px).
Number of video frames sent, cumulative value.
Video codec type. See .
Video packet loss rate (%) from the local end to the Agora edge server before network resilience.
Local video capture frame rate (fps).
Brightness level of the locally captured video. See .

Local video encoder acceleration type.
0: Uses software encoding, no acceleration.
1: Uses hardware encoding for acceleration.
